Entry.JapaneseText: 暗示のきっかけを与えた音……？ この部屋に来てからどんな音がした？
Entry.EnglishText: ...The sound that initiated the hypnosis? What sort of sounds did we hear after coming here?

Entry.JapaneseText: 呼び鈴……鳥の声……きっかけとなる音だ…… いつでも聞こえるものでは意味がない……
Entry.EnglishText: The bell, the chirping bird... It could have been them... Some background noise wouldn't make sense...
